body.name: Rowenta 1750-Watt Auto Shut Off Stainless Steel SolePlate Steam Iron, Made in Germany
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by Capital Cookware.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 24 mins.
features: High precision profiled tip for perfect ironing results down to the last detail. Easy access to difficult areas such as narrow edges, seams and collars

Long-Lasting Performance: The high quality stainless steel soleplate ensures durable performance and glideability. The integrated anti-calcium system prevents scale from gathering in the iron and maintains steam performance and ironing results over time
Comfortable Ironing: The ergonomic grip provides a comfortable ironing experience
1750 Watts Powerful Steam for Perfect Results: Powerful steam boost to perfectly crease out stubborn wrinkles specifically on dry and thick fabrics, with help of the spray if necessary
Safety Auto-Off: The iron is automatically put on standby mode when left unattended: after 8 minutes when left on its heel, and after 30 seconds when left resting on its soleplate or side
body.description: Delivering unmatched precision down to the smallest details, the Rowenta Pro Steam iron rises to the challenge of demanding garments with outstanding ironing results. This high-performance steam iron features a profiled tip for ultimate precision, enabling wrinkle and crease removal in hard-to-reach areas such as narrow edges, seams and collars. Precision is matched by efficiency, as unique patented Microsteam400 Profile soleplate technology creates perfect steam coverage through its 400 active steam holes, with high-quality stainless steel for added durability. Rowenta Pro Steam delivers perfect results with absolute precision. German made for long lasting quality and 1750 watts of power for perfect results time after time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 features I do not like
reviews.reviewText: There are two features I do not like on this iron: #1-water well color is very dark. Therefore, old eyes like mine have a hard time seeing the water level while filling and ironing. #2 The thermostat moves to easily and is too close to the hand grip. Your hand sometimes will hit the thermostat when you are using the iron and change your setting. I do like the steam system and the weight of the iron. The weight is just right so you don't have to press down hard to get a smooth result. The steam system is far and above better than any iron I have ever owned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A solid iron
reviews.reviewText: I was a little apprehensive about ordering this iron because of the mixed reviews I read online. I have been very happy with this iron. It heats up fairly quickly, and the steam function works well. It is a sturdy iron, and I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Customer Service from Capital Cookware, the Authorized Rowenta Dealer
reviews.reviewText: Excellent and above expected customer service from Capital Cookware. My Rowenta iron arrived very damaged as it was badly packed.I contacted Capital Cookware's owner (in the package was a contact form in case of being unsatisfied with the order). The owner of the company answered the phone and solve my issue with great courtesy.I definitely recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice product made in Germany! I had several irons of that brand and was never unhappy with them. I didn't see the note in the item discription AS BEING USED. It was dusty and the packiging was torn, not plastic bag protected the iron and so it was VERY dusty - how come? The protective sticker under this iron was tuff to remove and left many clue residues at the nice stainless steel plate. I had a tuff time to remove it all with alcohol and cleaner. - TRY TO FIND A BRAND NEW ONE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 1750 watt iron pulls 14.6 amps. Do not buy if you only have a 15 amp circuit!
reviews.reviewText: Love the iron. But it keeps tripping the circuit breaker. If your sewing room is a converted bedroom it probably has a 15 amp circuit breaker protecting your outlet. This iron draws 14.6 amps. That only leaves 0.4 amps for lights, sewing machine and internet access. Check you breaker before buying this iron. If you do not have a 20 amp breaker on your iron circuit, buy an iron with a lower power rating. A 1200 watt iron only uses 10 amps. If all you have is a 15 amp circuit you would have 5 amps available for other uses in your sewing room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best iron ever
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Does a great job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So disappointed. My last Rowenta iron lasted over 20 years and countless drops on the floor so when it finally quit I didn't hesitate to buy another one. This one started leaking hot water from around the electrical cord and the bottom of the heat plate. Followed the instructions on the customer service website and "sorry no service center in my area". Tried a different pathway and again a dead end because the iron doesn't have a model number or serial number on it and of course I didn't keep the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best iron ever!
reviews.reviewText: This is my second Rowenta iron in 20 years because they are durable and are great performers. They are a good solid weight to give you well pressed clothes but isn't so heavy you have apply extra musclejust to move it around. Well worth the money and a great gift. Filling the water chamber is easy and gives off nice consistent steam. the bottom plate is smooth and doesn't snag your clothes
